text: The Northern Districts cricket team, based at Hamilton in New Zealand, has been active since 1955. The team has first-class status, and competes in the Plunket Shield which they have won nine times, most recently in 2024â€“25. Their home ground is Seddon Park in Hamilton. The team is known as the Northern Brave in limited overs matches. Category:First-class cricket teams in New Zealand
title: Northern Districts cricket team
